label: Individual survey dataset (long = individual format)
description: includes survey data in individual format – each individual in one row (vs. family format – all members of one family in one row)

label: Zygosity dataset
description: includes data of the zygosity questionnaire (basis of zygosity assessment of each twin pair)

label: Mode dataset
description: includes information on the interview mode of each variable and each individual (e.g. CAPI, CASI, PAPI, …)
